name: Air Fryer Italian Sausages, Peppers, and Onions
author: Bren
summary: Great on a crusty roll but they can be served over rice, if preferred. Add a whole link to a roll or cut diagonally and stretch the links for another portion.
ingredients: 1 small red bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 small yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 small orange bell pepper, thinly sliced
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Cut onions in half from root to stem; cut each half into thirds
Combine onions and bell peppers in a medium bowl
Add olive oil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper; toss to combine
Transfer vegetables into the air fryer basket and set the sausage links on top without touching one another
Turn sausages and air fry for another 10 minutes
Place each sausage in a bun and top with vegetables and provolone cheese
